thread.title: The Single Best, Most Hypocritical, Trump-Hating Tweet From 2016
thread.title_full: The Single Best, Most Hypocritical, Trump-Hating Tweet From 2016

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: The Single Best, Most Hypocritical, Trump-Hating Tweet From 2016
text:
Franklin Graham: It Was the “Hand of God” That Allowed Trump to Win 
Before the election was decided, Laci Green thought that the very existence of Donald Trump indicated that America needed to become more “united.” After the election, as you’ll see, we found out where exactly the division came from ( WARNING: Explicit language ): Still probably my favorite 2016 moment pic.twitter.com/BXz06Teay4 
— Ben McDonald (@Bmac0507) January 2, 2017 
Yeah, listen to Laci! We need to be more united, you racist, misogynist pieces of s***!   
While Green wasn’t the only liberal having a Clark Griswold “Jelly of the Month Club”-style meltdown on the night of Nov. 8 , her self-evidently hypocritical remarks became emblematic of a very particular sort of hatred and bigotry endemic to the American political left, one that remained latent until the election didn’t go the way they had wanted. 
What’s even funnier is that this hatred had disguised itself as tolerance and love, as the opinions of entire swaths of individuals were branded as “hateful” with the repetition and subtlety of a bludgeoning. 
When it turned out those people had given the presidency to Donald Trump, that hatred became manifest. Thankfully, along with the ugliness, it gave us hilarious moments like this. 
And while there were a lot of nominees to pick from, we award you, Laci Green, the 2016 edition of Conservative Tribune’s prestigious Keith Olbermann Memorial Award for Most Deranged Meltdown of the Year. We wish you all the best of luck in repeating in 2017!
